description:
"Supernatural" star Jensen Ackles took some time during the 2013 San Diego Comic-Con to talk about what's coming in Season 9 of his show.在正在进行的2013圣地亚哥动漫大会上，《邪恶力量》主演Jensen Ackles透露了一些该剧第九季的剧情发展。

Here are some interview highlights that Jensen had to share:以下是他采访中提到的重点内容：

1、"They have no choice now but to dive in and figure out how they're going to navigate this whole new element that is now on their plate -- all the angels and demons ... We don't know how the angels are going to come into play, whether they're friend or foe."“他们必须去搞清楚现在的世界到底发生了什么，是什么在控制着天使恶魔这些事情的发展...我们不知道天使们是想要干什么，也不知道他们是敌是友。”

"I like the fact that Dean is not playing the guilty cheerleader anymore."“我喜欢现在Dean不在扮演内疚感啦啦队的角色这种状态。”

"They have outgrown the scope of Dad's journal to the extent of what they're dealing with."“他们已经成熟到可以继续探索他们父亲的旅行的程度了。”

On Castiel becoming human: "It's going to be interesting to see how the relationship between Castiel and -- not just Dean but Dean and Sam. "关于Catiel变成人类：“Castiel变成人类之后，他们之间的关系会变得非常有意思——不仅仅是他和Dean的关系，还有Dean和Sam的关系。

  • 10个小测试看看你的身体是否健康
  • 这些知名公司竟然在2013年换了logo！
